PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-08982008-05-09,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisAppointment by the Minister of Industry of ELLEN BARRY of Hanwell, New Brunswick, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, representing the region set out in subparagraph 11(3)(a)(i) of the Act, to hold office during pleasure on a part-time basis for a term of four years.
